name: markdown-to-pdf
title: Markdown to PDF Converter
description: Convert Markdown files to beautifully formatted PDF documents
content:
Overview

This application converts Markdown files into beautifully formatted PDF documents. Built using Python-Markdown and WeasyPrint, it renders all standard Markdown syntax including tables, code blocks, and lists.

Features

  • Convert Markdown (.md) files to PDF
  • Supports all standard Markdown syntax
  • Beautiful typography and formatting
  • Code syntax highlighting
  • Tables, lists, and blockquotes
  • Automatic installation of dependencies

Parameters

  • Input File: Upload your Markdown file (.md) from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for the PDF output

Output

The application generates a PDF file with the same base name as your input file (e.g., README.md becomes README.pdf). The PDF includes professional formatting with proper spacing, typography, and styling.

Use Cases

  • Converting README files to PDF
  • Creating printable documentation
  • Generating PDF reports from Markdown
  • Sharing formatted documents
command: REPO_DIR="prod_apps_$(date +%s%N)"; rm -rf "$REPO_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true; git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git "$REPO_DIR" && python "$REPO_DIR/python/markdown_to_pdf.py" "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}"
